about: Support-focused developer with 15 years of experience troubleshooting complex applications, training users and enhancing system performance and functionality in pharmacovigilance, time-and-attendance, and access control.

employment.description: Part of a Scrum team developing a pharmacovigilance web application using Angular, Java, and Oracle; building search and administrative features for user access, reporting and product management.
tasks: Managing Jenkins deployment pipelines for Linux Docker environments
Optimising data export with Apache POI for efficient data handling
Designing Spring Boot microservices with scalable API endpoints
Writing Jasmine unit tests to ensure frontend application reliability
Conducting technical feasibility assessments and performing peer code reviews

employment.description: Experienced in supporting a pharmacovigilance database, troubleshooting software issues, providing user support, and ensuring data integrity.
tasks: Delivered technical support and user training, efficiently resolving support tickets
Implemented system and database enhancements to improve functionality and performance
Generated monthly issue reports for custom insights and tracking
Developed applications to streamline internal support team workflows
Created a web-based troubleshooting interface for customer connectivity diagnostics

employment.description: Application and hardware support for customers using time and attendance, access control, personnel and energy management systems. Security vetted as non-police personnel by West Midlands Police.
tasks: Microsoft SQL and MSDE database configuration and support
Technical hardware installation guidance given to electrical engineers
Firmware and software upgrades executed using remote access tools
Application server migration and software installation support

employment.description: First line service desk role delivering IT and Facilities support to NHS Strategic Health Authority and Primary Care Trust staff across the Anglia region.
tasks: Microsoft Windows Active Directory account administration
Microsoft Exchange 2007 account management via OWA
Enforcing NHS Trust IT and email policies
Microsoft Office 2003/2007 application support

employment.description: Second line support role, including out-of-hours support for retailers in the UK and Europe using Itim end-to-end retail applications.
tasks: EFT and EPoS software and hardware support for shop floor and back office teams
Responsible for EPoS provision and management for new and refitted stores
Resolved support requests using remote access applications
Microsoft SQL and DP4 database management

employment.description: IT support role for UK and European customers in small or home office environments. In addition to this role I provided administrative support to Sales staff.
tasks: Provided Microsoft Windows and Office application support to customers
Maintained records of customer requests, incidents and assets
Produced quotes, invoices and contracts for scheduled work
Gave technical sales advice to customers

employment.description: A skilled baker with experience producing frozen pies, pastries, bread and cakes while maintaining high standards of quality and safety.
tasks: Safely operated machinery and maintained cleanliness to meet regulations
Managed inventory to ensure ingredient availability and product quality
Worked with the team to improve production efficiency

employment.description: IT recycling technician with hands-on experience in managing the lifecycle of decommissioned electronic equipment.
tasks: Efficiently processed pallets of printers, monitors, desktop and notebook computers
Destroyed data to ensure compliance with data protection regulations
Cleaned and refurbished devices to meet quality standards for resale at auction

courses.name: Sports, Recreation and Allied Occupations Leadership

interests: I play inline hockey with a local club and serve on the club committee, where I am responsible for development and maintenance of our online roster, using PHP, Vue.JS, Google Apps Script and SQLite/MariaDB, allowing skaters to confirm their attendance at each session.
My enthusiasm for technology focuses on security and open-source software. I am a dedicated Linux user and actively manage several self-hosted services, allowing me to develop new skills.
